description: Master a watermelon cake with our simple recipe which uses store-bought sponge cake for ease, as well as ricotta and watermelon for a perfect flavour combo.
name: Watermelon Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve scattered with raspberries, remaining pistachio and extra zest, and drizzled with honey.
